<!-- Any extra information that might be useful in the debugging process. -->
<!--- This is normally the contents of a `debug.log` or `config.log` file. Raw text or a link to a pastebin type site are preferred. -->

Since Bitcoin Core v0.16.1, bitcoin-qt has this problem where minimizing or closing bitcoin-qt makes the window unrestorable, requiring you to exit the program from the system tray menu and restart bitcoin-qt. The only exception to this is by left-clicking the Bitcoin icon in the system tray to alternate between minimize and restore.

Using Bitcoin Core v0.16.1 compiled from source.

OS: Linux Gentoo w/Plasma
CPU: i7-4790k (Haswell Refresh)
Disk type: HDD
title: Cannot restore bitcoin-qt window if minimized or closed to systray
